fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.util.algebra

Class ThreadedMatrixOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.util.algebra.ThreadedMatrixOperations

  • public class ThreadedMatrixOperations
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides multithreaded basic linear algebra operations on matrices.
    Author:
    picard
